allow:
Bash(powershell -NoProfile -File - << 'EOF'
Add-Type -AssemblyName System.IO.Compression.FileSystem
$zipPath = Get-ChildItem "C:\\gb_0900_ljs\\spring\\" -Recurse -Filter "workspace.zip" | Where-Object { $_.DirectoryName -match "spring_day10" } | Select-Object -First 1 -ExpandProperty FullName
$zip = [System.IO.Compression.ZipFile]::OpenRead\($zipPath\)
$zip.Entries | Where-Object { $_.FullName -match "\\.java$|\\.xml$|\\.yaml$|\\.yml$" } | ForEach-Object { $_.FullName } | Sort-Object
$zip.Dispose\(\)
EOF)

Bash(powershell -NoProfile -File - << 'EOF'
Add-Type -AssemblyName System.IO.Compression.FileSystem
$zipPath = Get-ChildItem "C:\\gb_0900_ljs\\spring\\" -Recurse -Filter "workspace.zip" | Where-Object { $_.DirectoryName -match "spring_day10" } | Select-Object -First 1 -ExpandProperty FullName
Write-Host "Zip path: $zipPath"
$zip = [System.IO.Compression.ZipFile]::OpenRead\($zipPath\)
Write-Host "Total entries: $\($zip.Entries.Count\)"
$zip.Entries | Select-Object -First 30 | ForEach-Object { $_.FullName }
$zip.Dispose\(\)
EOF)
